frontmatter.title: ملخص كتاب Design Systems Handbook
frontmatter.description: ملخصي لكتاب Design Systems Handbook لـ InVision
frontmatter.introduction: من فترة كنت بقرأ كتاب بعنوان Design Systems Handbook بيتكلم عن خطوات الـ design و الـ development في الشركات الكبيرة اللي بتستعمل Design Systems والمشاكل اللي بتحصل في الـ design at scale.

frontmatter.title: 10 نصايح لل Problem Solving
frontmatter.description: في المقالة دي هشارك 10 نصائح بمشي عليهم في حل المشكلات
frontmatter.introduction: ال problem solving مهارة مطلوبة جداً في شغلنا و في حياتنا عامة, بس في ناس كتير بتعاني بسبب انهم مش عارفين ايه الصح و ايه الغلط في اللي بيعملوه, في المقالة دي هتكلم باختصار عن 10 نقط ساعدوني شخصياً.

frontmatter.title: How I Manage My Time as a Student-Developer - Part 1
frontmatter.description: In this article I'll explore my time management habits. Part 1.
frontmatter.introduction: Time management can be a terrible experience, especially if you're a student and don't know how to do it properly. Hopefully by the end of this article you'll be able to manage your time well.

frontmatter.title: How I Manage My Time as a Student-Developer - Part 2
frontmatter.description: In this article I'll explore my time management habits. Part 2.
frontmatter.introduction: Negative influences are things that keep us from reaching our goals, and making a better life for ourselves. It's a hindrance to our performance and should be handled with strong arms.

frontmatter.title: Pipeline Operator
frontmatter.description: شكل الـ function calls لما بيكونوا جوا بعض وحش, النهاردة هنخلص من الشكل ده ونخلي شكلة جميل جداً

frontmatter.title: Optional Chaining Operator: How and Why
frontmatter.description: In this post I'll talk about the Optional Chaining Operator and how to get rid of complex object property lookups
frontmatter.introduction: Have you ever expected a deeply nested property of an object to be there but was shocked when you received `Uncaught TypeError: Can't get blabla of undefined`? Worry no more!

frontmatter.title: ازاي و ليه تستخدم الـ Optional Chaining Operator
frontmatter.description: النهاردة هنتعلم ازاي نستخدم الـ optional chaining operator عشان نتخلص من ايرورز الابوجكتس و الif الطويلة.
frontmatter.introduction: عمرك حاولت تجيب قيمة من اعماق اوبجكت بس اتفاجئت ان الكود بيديلك ايرور بسبب ان قيمة في النص بتطلع Undefined؟ في المقالة دي هنتعلم ازاي منقعش في الغلط ده باستخدام الـ optional chaining operator.

frontmatter.title: JavaScript Promises
frontmatter.description: JavaScript Promises is one of the most difficult objects to understand. I'll explain them in an easy manner.
frontmatter.introduction: Promises can cause a lot of confusion for newbies, just like it did to me when I first encountered them. Their names may not be the most descriptive but let's get over that.

frontmatter.title: History of JavaScript
frontmatter.description: JavaScript is one of the most popular languages to exist, but what put it in such a place?
frontmatter.introduction: JavaScript appeared in late 90's after Java had started to gain attraction in the market. Learn how it got to this point over the course of history in this tiny article.

frontmatter.title: Tutorial Purgatory
frontmatter.description: Tutorial Purgatory is a curse that haunts every newbie developer, here's how to escape it.
frontmatter.introduction: Tutorial purgatory is defined as the act of going from a tutorial to another without practically learning anything. This is not limited to coding only, but I'll stick to the coding part of the equation.
